alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Hamilton; Jackson; Jefferson; Johnson; Perry; Pope; Saline; Williamson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 2:26PM CDT until May 07 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Perry County in south central Illinois... Northern Pope County in southern Illinois... Southeastern Jefferson County in south central Illinois... Eastern Johnson County in southern Illinois... Williamson County in southern Illinois... Saline County in southern Illinois... Northeastern Jackson County in southern Illinois... Southwestern Hamilton County in south central Illinois... Franklin County in south central Illinois... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 225 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Royalton to 9 miles south of Creal Springs to near Vienna, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. Reports of quarter sized hail have been recieved. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marion, Herrin, Harrisburg, West Frankfort, Benton, Du Quoin, Carterville, Eldorado, Johnston City, Mcleansboro, Christopher, Rend Lake Area, Sesser, Zeigler, Crainville, Cambria, Royalton, Energy, Galatia and Hurst. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Illinois between Mile Markers 2 and 13, and between Mile Markers 17 and 20. Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 45 and 81. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Franklin; Hamilton; Jackson; Jefferson; Johnson; Perry; Pope; Saline; Williamson
